title: Mini Me
data:
**Mini Me** is one of the new possible maps for [Sokoban](/wiki/Sokoban "Sokoban") Level 4 in [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It has 10 [boulders](/wiki/Boulder "Boulder") and 8 [pits](/wiki/Pit "Pit"), leaving 2 spare boulders.

```
        ---  0 boulder
----   -->-- ^ pit
|??-----...| > starting position/downstairs
|..^^^..00.| < upstairs
|^----.-.0.|Â ? scroll of earth
|^----.|.0.|
|^||.0.|0..|
|^||..0-.0.|
|^||.0..0..|
|<||..--...|
------------
```

## Strategy

Start by "pairing off" the boulders on the right side before clearing the first pit:

```
        ---  F d
----   -->-- C l
|??-----...| D d
|..^^^..AB.| B d
|^----.-.C.| A lll*
|^----.|.D.|
|^||.J.|E..|
|^||..I-.F.|
|^||.H..G..|
|<||..--...|
------------
```

Push in the next two boulders, then pick up the [scrolls of earth](/wiki/Scroll_of_earth "Scroll of earth") before resuming:

```
        ---  C ulll l*
----   -->-- B ulll lll*
|??-----...|
|..^^......|
|^----.-CB.|
|^----.|...|
|^||.J.|ED.|
|^||..I-...|
|^||.H..GF.|
|<||..--...|
------------
```

Finish off the next two boulders:

```
        ---  E uuul llll lld*
----   -->-- D uuul llll llld d*
|..-----...|
|..........|
|^----.-...|
|^----.|...|
|^||.J.|ED.|
|^||..I-...|
|^||.H..GF.|
|<||..--...|
------------
```

Fill in the last three pits - be sure to double-check for items under **J** and **H**:

```
        ---  G uuuu ulll llll ddd*
----   -->-- F uuuu ulll llll lddd d*
|..-----...| I uuuu llll lddd dd*
|..........|
|.----.-...|
|.----.|...|
|^||.J.|...|
|^||..I-...|
|^||.H..GF.|
|<||..--...|
------------
```

## Next level

The next level is chosen from one of the following:

- [Squared Off](/wiki/Squared_Off "Squared Off")
- [Old Reliable](/wiki/Old_Reliable "Old Reliable")
- [Old Man of the Mountain](/index.php?title=Old_Man_of_the_Mountain\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Old Man of the Mountain (page does not exist)")
- [Roundabout](/wiki/Roundabout "Roundabout")
- [Room to Breathe](/wiki/Room_to_Breathe "Room to Breathe")
- [The Gauntlet](/index.php?title=The_Gauntlet\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "The Gauntlet (page does not exist)")
- [Thinking Rabbit](/index.php?title=Thinking_Rabbit\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Thinking Rabbit (page does not exist)")
- [A Secret to Everybody](/wiki/A_Secret_to_Everybody "A Secret to Everybody")
- [Escape Goat](/wiki/Escape_Goat "Escape Goat")
- [Christmas Chimney](/index.php?title=Christmas_Chimney\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Christmas Chimney (page does not exist)")
- [Fly on the Wall](/wiki/Fly_on_the_Wall "Fly on the Wall")
- [Boulder Halls of Zim](/wiki/Boulder_Halls_of_Zim "Boulder Halls of Zim")
- [Two-Phase](/wiki/Two-Phase "Two-Phase")
- [The Snake](/wiki/The_Snake "The Snake")
- [Count Carefully](/wiki/Count_Carefully "Count Carefully")
- [You Only Need Six](/wiki/You_Only_Need_Six "You Only Need Six")
- [Four Wings](/wiki/Four_Wings "Four Wings")
html:
Mini Me

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Mini Me is one of the new possible maps for Sokoban Level 4 in Hack'EM. It has 10 boulders and 8 pits, leaving 2 spare boulders. 

        ---  0 boulder
----   -->-- ^ pit
|??-----...| > starting position/downstairs
|..^^^..00.| < upstairs
|^----.-.0.| ? scroll of earth
|^----.|.0.|
|^||.0.|0..|
|^||..0-.0.|
|^||.0..0..|
|<||..--...|
------------

Strategy

Start by "pairing off" the boulders on the right side before clearing the first pit: 

        ---  F d
----   -->-- C l
|??-----...| D d
|..^^^..AB.| B d
|^----.-.C.| A lll*
|^----.|.D.|
|^||.J.|E..|
|^||..I-.F.|
|^||.H..G..|
|<||..--...|
------------

Push in the next two boulders, then pick up the scrolls of earth before resuming: 

        ---  C ulll l*
----   -->-- B ulll lll*
|??-----...|
|..^^......|
|^----.-CB.|
|^----.|...|
|^||.J.|ED.|
|^||..I-...|
|^||.H..GF.|
|<||..--...|
------------

Finish off the next two boulders: 

        ---  E uuul llll lld*
----   -->-- D uuul llll llld d*
|..-----...|
|..........|
|^----.-...|
|^----.|...|
|^||.J.|ED.|
|^||..I-...|
|^||.H..GF.|
|<||..--...|
------------

Fill in the last three pits - be sure to double-check for items under J and H: 

        ---  G uuuu ulll llll ddd*
----   -->-- F uuuu ulll llll lddd d*
|..-----...| I uuuu llll lddd dd*
|..........|
|.----.-...|
|.----.|...|
|^||.J.|...|
|^||..I-...|
|^||.H..GF.|
|<||..--...|
------------

Next level

The next level is chosen from one of the following:

  • Squared Off
  • Old Reliable
  • Old Man of the Mountain
  • Roundabout
  • Room to Breathe
  • The Gauntlet
  • Thinking Rabbit
  • A Secret to Everybody
  • Escape Goat
  • Christmas Chimney
  • Fly on the Wall
  • Boulder Halls of Zim
  • Two-Phase
  • The Snake
  • Count Carefully
  • You Only Need Six
  • Four Wings

         ---  0 boulder
 ----   -->-- ^ pit
 |??-----...| > starting position/downstairs

== Strategy ==
Start by "pairing off" the boulders on the right side before clearing the first pit:

         ---  '''F''' d
 ----   -->-- '''C''' l

 |..^^^..AB.| '''B''' d

 |^----.|.D.|
 |^||.J.|E..|
 |^||..I-.F.|

 |<||..--...|
 ------------

Push in the next two boulders, then pick up the [[scroll of earth|scrolls of earth]] before resuming:

Fill in the last three pits - be sure to double-check for items under '''J''' and '''H''':
